note: CC106 - Export DV Lifestyle 900mm Cabinets & Benchtops
expression:
//set variables
$benchtop = ""
$cabpanels = ""

FOREACH $$choice$$ IN $$Choices/Cabinetwork/Cabinetwork - Style & Size$$ ,
    IF $$choice/item$$ == "Lifestyle 900mm"
    THEN 
        //set variables rather THEN be querying a selections dynamic key every time
        $cabpanels = $$Choices/Cabinetwork/Cabinetwork - Cabinetry & Fixed Panels/Bathroom/item$$
        $benchtop = $$Choices/Cabinetwork/Cabinetwork - Benchtops/Bathroom/item$$

        //Choose AND export Lifestyle Cabinets
        SWITCH($cabpanels,
            CASE "Teakwood", 
                EXPORT("106.425", 1, 106, 1, 1, "")
            CASE "DV Portland Ash", 
                EXPORT("106.435", 1, 106, 1, 1, "")
            CASE "DV Diamond White Gloss", 
                EXPORT("106.440", 1, 106, 1, 1, "")
        EXPORT("each", 1, 106, 1, 1, "DV Cabinet Colour not found")
        )

        //Choose AND export benchtops
        SWITCH($benchtop,
            CASE "20mm Iceland", 
                EXPORT("106.0102", 1, 106, 2, 1, "")
            CASE "20mm Cotton White", 
                EXPORT("106.0104", 1, 106, 2, 1, "")
            CASE "20mm Carrera White", 
                EXPORT("106.0110", 1, 106, 2, 1, "")
            CASE "20mm Storm Grey", 
                EXPORT("106.0112", 1, 106, 2, 1, "")
        EXPORT("each", 1, 106, 1, 1, "DV Benchtop Colour not found")
        )

    //Add installs
    EXPORT("106.815", 1, 106, 1, 1, "")
    EXPORT("106.715", 1, 106, 2, 1, "")

    ENDIF 
NEXT
